author: macfarla
content:
Getting an error with lodestar latest docker image on VM (aarch64 GNU/Linux)
error starting the docker container
`   Error: Cannot find module '@chainsafe/hashtree-linux-arm64-gnu'
    Require stack:
    - /usr/app/node_modules/.pnpm/@chainsafe+hashtree@1.0.2/node_modules/@chainsafe/hashtree/index.js`
using docker images from chainsafe/lodestar:
getting this error with v1.39.0  and latest 
using v1.38.0 it works

author: matthewkeil
content: we are looking into it. we switched package managers with this release but have not seen this come up before. will get back to you asap
